display_name: Average number of drinks consumed per day on the days you drank in the past 30 days (count a can or bottle of beer, a wine cooler or a glass of wine, champagne, or sherry, a shot of liquor or a mixed drink or cocktail) - Mother

other.source_name: On the days that you drank during the past 30 days, how many drinks did you usually have each day? )Count as a drink a can or bottle of beer; a wine cooler or a glass of wine, champagne, or sherry; a shot of liquor or a  mixed drink or cocktail).   Notes
